values:
Hello, 

Of course I am speaking to the only person who reads this crap. My beautiful Lamburgini. She is wonderful. Hello Love, how are ya? GOod I hope. 

I am just listening to a terrific new (couple) of albums. Jet- Get Born, Elvis Costello artist choice, and Roberta Flack the best of. Some fantastic tunes. 

Anywho, I am leaving las vegas tomorrow, and will miss you all so very much. 

By the way, If anyone cares. coldplay will be in tampa on the 14th, so be there or be triangle (thanks amber)

much love 

me

well well well, all the girls down at the tittie bar are pretty mad at me. but what can i do about it, i can't help it that i have dentures. the guys love that. just love it. 

I just wanna give a shout out to my prego, leggo my prego to be exact. she knows who she is, baby aint mine, but i love her anyway. 

im your momma, im you daddy, im that nigga in the alley, go on curtis. 

i think that sometimes, i just need to let it all hang out, and when it hangs out it hangs pretty f-ing low. 

peace and hairgrease 

me

When you try your best, but you don't succeed. When you get what you want ,but not what you need. When u feel so tired, but you can't sleep. Stuck in reverse
And the tears come streaming down your face. When u lose something you can't replace. When u love someone, but it goes to waste. could it be worse?
Lights will guide you home, and ignite your bones. i will try to fix you. 
Up high above or down below, when you too in love to let it go. 
and if never try you'll never know, just what your worth. 
lights will guide you home, and ignite your bones. i will try to fix you.

I wish there was someway for me to forget all of this pain i feel lately. so heavy the past seems. i can't rasie myhead up high anymore, i feel so wrthless. I can't stop crying. I wish i could have what i want. i wish what i wanted was what i needed. i want someone to fix me, is there anyone out there? 

I feel so lost here, now. I am nothing without peace. 

please help me...

Okay so this is my first entry, well that I can remember. I don't have as much to say as some of you Kat's dew, but @ least this might be interesting to those who know me best(unlikely, but there is always hope). 

What do you say in things like this?, um.. I like toast....I haven't had sex in a really long time and I think it's starting to wear down my brain cells. I like picking my nose on tuesdays and I haven't washed my ass today. 

I listened to this really great Springsteen song today, AKA The BOSS, what do you suppose he is the Boss of? Is it really bad hairdo's or is it best impersonation's of Bob Dylan? I am going with option 2. 

....I hate people, I work with some of the biggest dumb asses on the face of the planet, I think that the IQ level of most of the people that I talk to can't be much larger than their shoe size. It is so amazing to me, how disinterested most people are in the fact that they can't do simple math.(working in a credit union will do this to you). 

well that is all I have for the moment, I am sure that if you have read all of this you have decided never to come back, and that's great. Fuck you very much...and for those of you who are really dull and decide to come again, fuck ewe as well....

peace

well well well...
what can you say about a 65 year old stripper other than, how does she dew it. well my friends, that is not an easy answer. so i ain't telling ya. 

Say it loud, Im black and Im proud... That's right bitch!...

okay so, not much to say, I am fucked up on Nyquil and getting ready sweat to the oldies. 

Peace
